LanguageData.RM_MechanoidCrate.label: mech crate
LanguageData.RM_MechanoidCrate.description: A mechanoid crate of unknown purpose. It's insides are made up from machinery, motors and other mysterious apparatus.\n\nA strange noise can be heard coming from them.
LanguageData.RM_MechanoidPlasmaCell.label: plasma cell
LanguageData.RM_MechanoidPlasmaCell.description: A mechanoid plasma cell used for refueling of plasma based weapons. The unstable plasma stored inside makes it unstable. If damaged, the cell will generate a massive explosion.\n\nSome brave humans steal these from mechanoids for their own use as defensive bombs. However, an unintentional detonation can be devastating.
LanguageData.RM_BrokenSpirit.label: ancient spirit
LanguageData.RM_BrokenSpirit.description: A dormant or deactivated Dextro-class mechanoid transport ship used for troop and cargo transit between surface and orbit, or between moons of a planetary system.
